pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Landing gear and ELT panel for the HJet
NOTES: - Designed for the HJet by Marwan Gharib. Will not work with any other aircraft. - ELT knob will not control the knob in the virtual cockpit. This is a limitation of the plane itself and the knob being controls by inaccessible B vars.
